lines.text: [Theresa is talking to her boyfriend Mark about his best friend David]

He's a good friend of yours, Mark. The best. There's a moment before the accident that we were on the beach, talking and feeling close. We went skinny-dipping. I wanted to make love and I think he did too. But he wouldn't, because of you.
What are YOU gonna do, sit there and die?
My pa, he doesn't like strangers coming around... says it upsets the chickens.
I think obviously somebody in this school is insane.
